Articles.Content: Just saying hey! I started playing KSP in the early stages, but forgot about it. I just recently redownloaded and purchased it. I can\'t stop! I\'m addicted.
Just wait until .16 -- I know Im not going to be able to get off it!!

Just wait until .16 -- I know Im not going to be able to get off it!!

Just saying hey! I started playing KSP in the early stages, but forgot about it. I just recently redownloaded and purchased it. I can\'t stop! I\'m addicted.

Welcome back fella! A friend first pointed KSP out to me a year ago when the first public releases were out, I\'ve been playing it ever since. I\'m a total spaceflight nut so this game is just absolute heaven for me. The fact you can now play around with aircraft too is just incredible. You ever need any help just ask.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
